hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SITE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Site name. Lower case, no spaces

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SITE_REMOTE_UUID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: UUID of the remote site's aggregate resource

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SITE_BASE_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Base URL for the site. Ex: https://my-pic-sure.org/picsure/

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SITE_TOKEN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Long term token for the CommonAreaUser

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# cd to relevant part of repo cd pic-sure-passthru-resource
# Generate uuid RESOURCE_ID=`uuidgen -r` RESOURCE_ID_HEX=`echo $RESOURCE_ID | awk '{ print toupper($0) }'|sed 's/-//g';` export SQL="INSERT INTO resource (uuid, targetURL, resourceRSPath, description, name, token) \ VALUES (unhex('$RESOURCE_ID_HEX'), NULL, 'http://passthru/$RESOURCE_PATH/', 'Passthru for $SITE_NAME', '$SITE_NAME', NULL);"
# Add generated uuid to database docker run --rm -i -v $MYSQL_CONFIG_DIR/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=${MYSQL_NETWORK:-host} mysql mysql -e "$SQL" picsure
# If there is no application.properties, make one mkdir -p /usr/local/docker-config/passthru/ if [ ! -f '/usr/local/docker-config/passthru/application.properties' ]; then cp src/main/resources/application.properties /usr/local/docker-config/passthru fi
# Prepare the properties updater cd properties-updater docker build . -t properties-updater docker run --rm -i -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/passthru/application.properties:/application.properties properties-updater $SITE_NAME $SITE_REMOTE_UUID $RESOURCE_ID $SITE_BASE_URL $SITE_TOKEN
